name: Soul Slam!
description:
This submission for the #unrealjam August 2022 is a spin on the classic "Joust," where a Devil and an Angel battle for human souls. As the battle looms, the Earth's environment adjusts to the chaos...

Controls:
Movement: W A S D 
Use S key for precise landing, and Space Bar for Jump.

All audio, meshes, particle effects, post process effects, fonts, pictures, and animations were sourced.

All Blueprints, Anim BPs, Audio, and gameplay:
Justin Piatt - TheycallmePiatt@gmail.com
